QuestData.Title: Sepulcher of the First Ones - Heavy is the Crown
QuestData.Description:
Anduin's blade is a powerful conduit for The Jailer. If we claim fragments of this weapon, I'll be able to open a pathway directly to the boy king.
Four fragments should be enough. With these, we can break the Jailer's hold on Anduin for good.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Sword Fragments from Anduin within the Sepulcher of the First Ones on Heroic Difficulty.
